channel.title: Resources on Math2001's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on Math2001's blog

item.title: Great resources for VIM users
item.description: If you’re a VIM user, have a look at these resources, they’re pretty good (you probably will know some ­ if not all ­ of them) vimcast.org Just awesome screencasts and tips in general vimcolors.com A list of color schemes vimawesome.com A website listing vim plugin vi.stackexchange.com The stack exchange website for VIM
